body_html: @fehiepsi it's not that we don't pay attention. We have a limited amount of resources (most notably developer time), and there's just a ton of other work we have to do. Debugging numerically heavy, complex routines like LBFGS is hard and takes a lot of time, and we didn't get to it just yet. We'd greatly appreciate any help with that!
